de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.arraylike

Interface ArrayAdapter<T,A>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Item type
    A - Array object type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NumberArrayAdapter<N,A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayDBIDsAdapter, AttributeWiseBetaNormalization.Adapter, AttributeWiseCDFNormalization.Adapter, DoubleArray, DoubleArrayAdapter, ExtendedArray, FeatureVectorAdapter, FlatMatrixAdapter, FloatArrayAdapter, IdentityArrayAdapter, IntegerArray, ListArrayAdapter, LMomentsEstimator.ReverseAdapter, NodeArrayAdapter, NumberListArrayAdapter, NumberVectorAdapter, SingleSubsetArrayAdapter, SubsetArrayAdapter, SubsetNumberArrayAdapter, VectorAdapter

    public interface ArrayAdapter<T,A>
    Adapter for array-like things. For example, arrays and lists.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get(A array, int off)
      Get the off'th item from the array.
      int size(A array)
      Get the size of the array.

        Get the size of the array.

        Returns:

      • get

        T get(A array,
    int off)
      throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Get the off'th item from the array.
        Parameters:
        array - Array to get from
        off - Offset
        Returns:
        Item at offset off
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - for an invalid index.
